#summary Demonstrates some example use cases.
#labels Example

= Introduction =

Below are some typical use cases for massencode.


==Recursively encode all raw DVD files on a drive==

*Drive containing DVD files*: M:\

*Format to encode DVDs to*: avi

*Check child folders*: Yes (_-R_)

*Delete original files once encoded*: Yes (_-D_)

*Output*: Save all files under M:\ regardless of child folder found in.

*Run*: massencode.exe -i M:\ -f avi -o M:\ -R -D --params "<Other CLI Commands>" --verbose

==Same example as above, with pause==

*Pause between 8-10a and 4-6p*

*Run*: massencode.exe -i M:\ -f avi -o M:\ -R -D --params "<Other CLI Commands>" --verbose -p 0800:1000,1600:1800
